data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Ratnapura, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ratnapura, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ratnapura, Sri Lanka to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ratnapura, Sri Lanka. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Ratnapura.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Sayyid people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 163 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, encourage the 163 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Ratnapura who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Ratnapura
location.people_groups_list: Sindhi (Muslim traditions), Vellidura, Pidayne Danno, Radayo, Vannan (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sindhi (Muslim traditions) (1,000), Vellidura (1,200), Pidayne Danno (8,800), Radayo (1,700), Vannan (Hindu traditions) (25,000)
